colour_hdri.models.dataset.dng Module¶

Adobe DNG SDK Dataset¶

Defines various dataset objects for Adobe DNG SDK:

  • ADOBE_DNG_XYZ_ILLUMINANT
  • DNG_ILLUMINANTS_CORRELATED_COLOUR_TEMPERATURE
  • LIGHT_SOURCE_TAG_TO_DNG_ILLUMINANTS
colour_hdri.models.dataset.dng.ADOBE_DNG_XYZ_ILLUMINANT = None¶

Adobe DNG SDK default illuminant for CIE XYZ colourspace.

ADOBE_DNG_XYZ_ILLUMINANT : tuple

colour_hdri.models.dataset.dng.DNG_ILLUMINANTS_CORRELATED_COLOUR_TEMPERATURE = <Mock name='mock.CaseInsensitiveMapping()' id='4496272528'>¶

Adobe DNG SDK illuminants correlated colour temperature.

References

..[1] Adobe Systems. (2015). Adobe DNG SDK 1.4 -
dng_sdk_1_4/dng_sdk/source/dng_camera_profile.cpp - dng_camera_profile::IlluminantToTemperature. Retrieved from http://download.adobe.com/pub/adobe/dng/dng_sdk_1_4.zip

Notes

  • The correlated colour temperature are given for the CIE 1931 2 Degree Standard Observer.

DNG_ILLUMINANTS_CORRELATED_COLOUR_TEMPERATURE : CaseInsensitiveMapping

colour_hdri.models.dataset.dng.LIGHT_SOURCE_TAG_TO_DNG_ILLUMINANTS = {1: u'Daylight', 2: u'Fluorescent', 3: u'Tungsten (incandescent light)', 4: u'Flash', 9: u'Fine weather', 10: u'Cloudy weather', 11: u'Shade', 12: u'Daylight fluorescent (D 5700 - 7100K)', 13: u'Day white fluorescent (N 4600 - 5500K)', 14: u'Cool white fluorescent (W 3800 - 4500K)', 15: u'White fluorescent (WW 3250 - 3800K)', 16: u'Warm white fluorescent (L 2600 - 3250K)', 17: u'Standard light A', 18: u'Standard light B', 19: u'Standard light C', 20: u'D55', 21: u'D65', 22: u'D75', 23: u'D50', 24: u'ISO studio tungsten', 255: u'Other'}¶

Adobe DNG SDK LightSource Tag indexes mapping to illuminants.

References

..[2] Adobe Systems. (2015). Adobe DNG SDK 1.4 -
dng_sdk_1_4/dng_sdk/source/dng_tag_values.h - LightSource tag. Retrieved from http://download.adobe.com/pub/adobe/dng/dng_sdk_1_4.zip

LIGHT_SOURCE_TAG_TO_DNG_ILLUMINANTS : CaseInsensitiveMapping
